item.title: A bowhead whale's DNA offers clues to fight cancer
item.description: Scientists searching for new ways to combat cancer think they may have uncovered a promising new lead in the DNA of the bowhead whale.

item.title: 'Nobody wants to come': What if the U.S. can no longer attract immigrant physicians?
item.description: Immigrants make up a significant proportion of all the country's doctors. New policies are making it harder and less appealing for foreign-born physic...

item.title: What foods make you happiest? It's not what you think
item.description: As you prepare for your holiday feast, here's something to consider. Research suggests there are certain foods that can help boost our moods and make ...

item.title: Deck the halls: Research shows decorating can soothe anxiety and bring cheer
item.description: Even if you aren't in the holiday spirit, decorating the tree and making Christmas cookies can trigger feel-good hormones.

item.title: Tatiana Schlossberg, the granddaughter of JFK, says she has a rare terminal cancer
item.description: In an essay in The New Yorker , Tatiana Schlossberg says she has acute myeloid leukemia. She also criticized her relative, Robert F. Kennedy Jr.
